title: HIM - Digital Versatile Doom
description:
Digital Versatile Doom (a.k.a Digital Versatile Doom: Live From the Orpheum Theatre XXXVII A.S.) is HIM&#039;s first live album and live DVD. The DVD was directed by Meiert Avis in Los Angeles at the Orpheum Theater between November 14 and 15, 2007. The DVD features the live performance, as well as behind the scenes look at the show. 

Track listing:
1) Intro (Blood Theme)
2) Passion&#039;s Killing Floor
3) Wings of a Butterfly
4) Buried Alive By Love
5) Wicked Game
6) The Kiss of Dawn
7) Vampire Heart
8) Poison Girl
9) Dead Lovers Lane
10) Join Me in Death
11) It&#039;s All Tears (Drown in This Love)
12) Sleepwalking Past Hope
13) Killing Loneliness
14) Soul On Fire
15) Your Sweet 666
16) Bleed Well
17) Right Here in My Arms
18) The Funeral of Hearts
19) V.D.O. (Venus Doom Outro)

Audio-Video info:
Video: MPEG4 Video (H264) 480x272 29.97fps 852Kbps
Audio: MPEG Audio Layer 3 (MP3) 48000Hz stereo 160Kbps

Video is NOT playable in Your stationary DVD players.

Have Fun!
